sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_ssa_pa.SSAUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SSAUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SSAUtils = Class.create();

SSAUtils.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {},
	
	showReportKnowledgeGapAction: function(query) {
		var key = 'mlc_cluster_id=';
		var isValidQuery = query.contains(key);
		
		if(isValidQuery) {
			var clusterId = query.substring(query.indexOf(key) + key.length).split('^')[0];	
			
			var record = new GlideRecordSecure('ml_cluster_summary');
			record.get(clusterId);

			return record.solution.ml_capability_definition == 'f544e59b7376001036fe41244ef6a7f6';
		}

		return false;
	},

    type: 'SSAUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-04-08 11:40:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>058ce2ed73cc10107a942e46fbf6a7f0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SSAUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Self-Service Analytics PA" source="sn_ssa_pa">91fd56c57348101036fe41244ef6a760</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Self-Service Analytics PA">91fd56c57348101036fe41244ef6a760</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_058ce2ed73cc10107a942e46fbf6a7f0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-08 11:50:55</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
